settings.heading: Get Stuck in on one of our courses

settings.event_title: A Spring Decorating Workshop at The Star, Alfriston
settings.event_intro: Be inspired in a fun and learning environment for the art of block printing with Molly Mahon and an addition of flower arranging with Julia Marsden, during your stay at the Star, the newest hotel in the Polizzi Collection
settings.event_description: Enjoy an eventful stay at The Star including one nights accommodation, breakfast, a three course diner with a glass of wine, drinks with Molly and Alex, both workshops, refreshments, all materials and a vase.

settings.event_title: Block printing Linen tea towels at Thyme, Cotswolds
settings.event_intro: Join printmaker Molly Mahon for a two hour workshop experiencing the joy of block printing, inspired by her shared love of nature and the surrounding land at Thyme.
settings.event_description: Thyme, a beautifully restored Manor House & Farm in the Cotswolds. The workshop will include a welcome from Thyme followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s garden inspired hand carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing your own linen tea towel.
settings.event_extras: The price includes a welcome coffee and all materials.

settings.event_title: Block printing Cards & Envelopes at Thyme, Cotswolds
settings.event_intro: Join printmaker Molly Mahon for a two hour workshop experiencing the joy of block printing, inspired by her shared love of nature and the surrounding land at Thyme.
settings.event_description: Thyme, a beautifully restored Manor House & Farm in the Cotswolds. The workshop will include a welcome from Thyme followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s garden inspired hand carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing your own set of beautiful cards and envelopes.
settings.event_extras: The price includes a welcome coffee and all materials.

settings.title: How about giving a workshop as a gift? Gift vouchers unavailable!

settings.event_title: Join Molly Mahon Online at Create Academy
settings.event_intro: Welcome to my online immersive block printing course. With over 5 hours of content, I hope to empower you to give this wonderful craft a go and offer step by step guides to get you going from your kitchen table.
settings.event_description: Jam packed with tips, tricks, inspiration and tours of places I love including my own home, this course gives a real insight in to how I work and how block print can open a world of creativity. You can access all the items you need from our Supplies Store, from lovely eco fabric paints, to tools, items to print and wooden printing blocks. Block printing has changed my life and I hope will bring joy to yours.
